snippet.title: F1® 22 | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Take your seat for the new era of Formula 1® - F1 22 arrives July 1 for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC: https://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-22
 
In the sport's biggest shake-up in over a decade, enter the future with new hybrid cars, overhauled rules, and a reimagined race weekend. Race the Miami International Autodrome, experience a redefined race day with Immersive and Broadcast options, the introduction of Sprint races, VR for PC players, and the glamourous world of Formula 1® with F1® Life. 
 
Pre-order the F1® 22 Champions Edition now, which includes three days early access and a time-limited Miami inspired content pack: https://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-22/news/f1-22-announce
 
#F122 #F122game #VR
